MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G75 postcode area of East Kilbride. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6AM in order to connect a generator to continue with works on the overhead network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:30AM. We will make every effort to contact you if the situation changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:40AM on 28 October 2020.
